long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Buy SQFT is a simple extension to help you sort real estate website listing by the price per square foot. Most real estate listing sites do not allow for sorting based on the price per square foot so I created this tool for that single purpose.

This extension currently works with sites like Zillow, Redfin, Realtor, and Trulia.
